name: There,
greetingText: - I really like your name btw!
wishText: Hope this message finds you in good health and spirits.;)
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you!! Yeee! Many many happy returns of the day .....
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
replayText: Love is not about keeping your loved one close to you all the time. Itâ€™s all about wishing for the happiness of better-half, whether you are together or not. Happy birthday  to u I am still grateful and thankful to the Lord for bringing you in my life. I love u
